text: The EU is at the heart of coronavirus global response. In 10 days, on 4 May, we will launch a global pledging effort. On that day we will also announce next milestones of a global campaign to kick off an ongoing rolling replenishment. → https://t.co/ADsLS09W08 https://t.co/kXUUMzVrOu
